alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cook; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cook, northwestern Lowndes and north central Brooks Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 608 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adel, moving south at 15 mph. At 554 PM EDT The Cotton Gin Lenox Ambient Weather Alert station reported 3 inches of rain over the past 2 hours. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Adel, Hahira, Sparks, Cecil, Reed Bingham State Park, Cook Co A/P, Barney, I-75 At Exit 29, Greggs and Pine Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
